dct_description_sm: Par Mrs. Sanson, et Bion; [after] I.[Jan] Goeree del; I.V.[Jan van] Vianen fecit.

California shown as large island on central globe, surrounded by winged figures, "Father Time" holding a portrait of Frederick I Elector of Brandenburg, and persons using navigational tools. To left of globe is person displaying map of "BRANDINBORGH" (central Germany).
I. Goeree del. (lower left) and I.V. Vianen fecit. (lower right).
